entry.title: $2250 // New renovations. Hardwood floors.â™¥ Exposed brick in every room
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 21987
2 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. 800 square feet, All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Knickerbocker Av, DeKalb Av. You want brick? You got it, lots of it. You want bright? Big, over-sized windows in bedrooms AND windows in every piece of common space. Bedrooms aren't large but living room is very big. PLUS a small but separate kitchen. New renovations. Hardwood floors. Exposed brick in every room. Third floor walk up. Roof access w/ Manhattan Skyline. Great location; in-between the DeKalb L & the Knickerbocker M. Near Maria Hernandez Park & lots of yummy places to eat. Heat & HW inc. April 1 starts

AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Exposed brick
Eat In Kitchen
Roof access
Outdoor Space
Granite countertops
